original_text: While Jesus was still speaking, Judas arrived. He was one of Jesus' 12 disciples. A crowd also came with him. They were carrying swords and heavy sticks. The leaders of the priests and the important Jews had sent these people with Judas.
korean_text: 말씀하실 때에 열둘 중의 하나인 유다가 왔는데 대제사장들과 백성의 장로들에게서 파송된 큰 무리가 칼과 몽치를 가지고 그와 함께 하였더라

sentences.original_text: He was one of Jesus' 12 disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예수의 12 제자 중 한 사람이었다

sentences.original_text: A crowd also came with him
They were carrying swords and heavy sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 칼과 무거운 막대기를 들고 있었다

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests and the important Jews
had sent these people with Judas
